# The `GCNRegPressure.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file defines the GCNRegPressure class, which tracks registry pressure by bookkeeping number of SGPR/VGPRs used, weights for large SGPR/VGPRs. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file defines the GCNRegPressure class, which tracks registry pressure by bookkeeping number of SGPR/VGPRs used, weights for large SGPR/VGPRs.

It also implements a compare function, which compares different register pressures, and declares one with max occupancy as winner.

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compares \\p this GCNRegpressure to \\p O, returning true if \\p this is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// less. Since GCNRegpressure contains different types of pressures, and due</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to target-specific pecularities (e.g. we care about occupancy rather than</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// raw register usage), we determine if \\p this GCNRegPressure is less than</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p O based on the following tiered comparisons (in order order of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// precedence):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1 Better occupancy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2 Less spilling (first preference to VGPR spills, then to SGPR spills)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 3 Less tuple register pressure (first preference to VGPR tuples if we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// determine that SGPR pressure is not important)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 4 Less raw register pressure (first preference to VGPR tuples if we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// determine that SGPR pressure is not important)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gcnregpressure/#aec7a7a1abbcf26f495eb5057cb42f311">less</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gcnregpressure">GCNRegPressure</a> &amp;O,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxOccupancy = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;unsigned&gt;::max()) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gcnregpressure/#aca9b1fb5a0a7177ef0942f0ae59df84c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gcnregpressure/#aca9b1fb5a0a7177ef0942f0ae59df84c">operator==</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gcnregpressure/#a70cc3973bc07308e03b0dada52c381b5">GCNRegPressure</a> &amp;O)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::equal(&amp;Value&#91;0&#93;, &amp;Value&#91;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gcnregpressure/#a9ce175d0125fd3b37a89f08f4545de83a5dc7fa7fc8f46beb88bc0ca6f41c1d11">TOTAL&#95;KINDS</a>&#93;, O.Value);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gcnregpressure/#a143f0dc7a1ac9c64dccd032253a89e3e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gcnregpressure/#a143f0dc7a1ac9c64dccd032253a89e3e">operator!=</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gcnregpressure/#a70cc3973bc07308e03b0dada52c381b5">GCNRegPressure</a> &amp;O)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> == O);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If \\p UseInternalIterator is true, then internal iterators are used and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// set to process in program order. If \\p UseInternalIterator is false, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// it is assumed that the tracker is using an externally managed iterator,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and advance&#42; calls will not update the state of the iterator. In such</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Move to the state at the MI, advanceBeforeNext has to be called first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If \\p UseInternalIterator is true, then internal iterators are used and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// set to process in program order. If \\p UseInternalIterator is false, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// it is assumed that the tracker is using an externally managed iterator,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// creates a map MachineInstr -&gt; LiveRegSet</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// R - range of iterators on instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// After - upon entry or exit of every instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note: there is no entry in the map for instructions with empty live reg set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Complexity = O(NumVirtRegs &#42; averageLiveRangeSegmentsPerReg &#42; lg(R))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Range&gt;</span></CodeLine>
